title: Understanding Competence and Performance in Linguistics | Noam Chomsky
description:
Explore the fascinating concepts of competence and performance in linguistics, as introduced by Noam Chomsky. Discover the difference between knowledge of language and actual language use, and learn how factors like education, social status, and even brain function can influence our speech. Perfect for language enthusiasts and learners alike!
